The composite image published on Twitter: 2019, showing Thanathorn Juanroongruangkit alongside an image of a document.
The misleading post: s Thai-language caption translating to English as: "Caught red handed! Thanathorn faked document!! Try checking whether the documents submitted to the Passport Division by this Chinese boy can be verified".
The image of a purported Thai military s: 2008, on a Wikipedia page about military conscription in Thailand.
The Royal Thai Army: s statement on December 10, 2019, declaring the claim on social media about Thanathorn's military service as "fake news".
